verbs.description: Nearly 1,800 immigrant families [V: were] separated at the U.S .- Mexico border from October 2016 through February of this year , according to a senior government official , as President Donald Trump implemented stricter border enforcement policies .

[ARG1: Nearly 1,800 immigrant families] were [V: separated] [ARGM-LOC: at the U.S .- Mexico border] [ARGM-TMP: from October 2016] [ARGM-TMP: through February of this year] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a senior government official] , [ARGM-TMP: as President Donald Trump implemented stricter border enforcement policies] .
